text: Paramount Parks was an operator of theme parks and attractions. In 1994, the Paramount Parks became a part of Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == *Cedar Fair official website *Gilroy Gardens (Formerly Bonfante Gardens) *Canada's Wonderland *Coney Island *Carowinds *California's Great America *Kings Dominion *Kings Island *Star Trek The Experience Category:Viacom Category:1994 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in North Carolina Category:Theme park companies
title: Paramount Parks
